Key Match Events: New Zealand won by 5 wickets (with 160 balls remaining)
Post-Match Reflections: Trent Boult was awarded the player of the match and CRICINFO's MVP
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trent Boult took 3 wickets for 37 runs
New Zealand won 2 points and Sri Lanka won 0 points
Others: The match was played at M Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru
The toss was won by New Zealand and they elected to field first
